fields.title: Amazing Race
fields.short_description: Outdoor race with strategic and fun challenges.
fields.description: Teams compete in a series of fun, strategic checkpoints and challenges across a venue or city. Great for collaboration and competition.

fields.title: Movie Making
fields.short_description: Script, act, and direct a team movie.
fields.description: Teams write, direct, and star in their own movies, promoting creativity and collaboration. Props and costumes included!

fields.title: Charity Bike Build
fields.short_description: Build and donate bikes to children.
fields.description: CSR activity where teams assemble bikes that are donated to underprivileged children. Inspires teamwork and community spirit.

fields.title: Minute To Win It
fields.short_description: Quick, hilarious indoor challenges.
fields.description: Teams face off in one-minute games that require skill and luck. Fast-paced, fun, and always a crowd-pleaser.

fields.title: MasterChef Challenge
fields.short_description: Compete to create the best dishes.
fields.description: Teams are given ingredients and time to whip up creative and tasty dishes. Judged on taste, creativity, and teamwork.

fields.title: Virtual Escape Room
fields.short_description: Solve puzzles remotely as a team.
fields.description: Team up online to solve clues, crack codes, and escape themed rooms before time runs out. Entirely virtual!

fields.title: Soap Box Derby
fields.short_description: Build and race soap box cars.
fields.description: Teams design, build, and race their own soap box cars. Combines engineering, creativity, and competitive fun!

fields.title: The Great Escape
fields.short_description: Physical and mental escape adventure.
fields.description: Teams are locked in themed rooms and must solve challenges to escape. Combines physical and mental puzzles for immersive fun.

fields.title: Treasure Hunt
fields.short_description: Outdoor hunt for hidden clues and prizes.
fields.description: Classic adventure that gets teams searching for hidden objects and solving clues. Customizable for any location.

fields.title: Drumming Circle
fields.short_description: Music and rhythm for all.
fields.description: Bring your team together with infectious beats and rhythm. No musical experience required!

fields.title: Art Workshop
fields.short_description: Creative art session for teams.
fields.description: Unleash creativity with team painting, sculpture, or other art projects. All abilities welcome!

fields.title: Quiz Show
fields.short_description: Fun, interactive trivia for all.
fields.description: Teams compete in live trivia contests. Great for knowledge, laughter, and teamwork. Available in-person or virtual!

fields.title: Potjiekos Competition
fields.short_description: Traditional South African cook-off.
fields.description: Teams cook up their best potjiekos in a festive outdoor setting. Judged on taste, teamwork, and creativity.

fields.title: Charity Toy Build
fields.short_description: Teams build toys for children in need.
fields.description: CSR-focused event where teams assemble and decorate toys for local charities. Makes a difference and boosts morale.

fields.title: Laughter Games
fields.short_description: Fun, hilarious team challenges.
fields.description: Games and challenges guaranteed to get everyone laughing, bonding, and letting off steam. No special skills required!

fields.title: Box Cart Building
fields.short_description: Build and race custom box carts.
fields.description: Design, construct, and decorate box carts, then race them for glory! Creativity, engineering, and teamwork required.

fields.title: Murder Mystery
fields.short_description: Solve a crime as a team.
fields.description: Interactive event where participants solve a fictional murder case. Great for problem-solving and teamwork.

fields.title: Virtual Quiz
fields.short_description: Compete in online trivia from anywhere.
fields.description: Teams connect online and test their knowledge in a range of fun trivia rounds. Great for remote engagement!

fields.title: Cultural Games
fields.short_description: Traditional South African team games.
fields.description: Celebrate South Africa’s heritage with traditional games and activities. Educational and entertaining!

fields.title: Team Olympics
fields.short_description: Sports-inspired, competitive team games.
fields.description: Compete in a series of Olympic-inspired activities. Encourages team pride, strategy, and friendly competition.

fields.title: Themed Dress-Up Day
fields.short_description: Dress up and celebrate creativity as a team.
fields.description: Teams come dressed in creative costumes according to a theme. Fosters creativity, morale, and fun memories.

fields.title: CSR Green Challenge
fields.short_description: Eco-friendly team building for a cause.
fields.description: Teams work together to complete environmental projects, such as planting trees or cleaning parks. Great for CSR and impact!

fields.title: Problem Solving Olympics
fields.short_description: A series of brain-teaser challenges.
fields.description: Teams compete in mental and problem-solving tasks for points and prizes. Perfect for critical thinking and collaboration.

fields.title: Photo Scavenger Hunt
fields.short_description: Teams complete photo-based challenges.
fields.description: Each team receives a list of photos to capture or scenes to recreate. Creativity, energy, and teamwork win the day!

fields.title: Virtual Cooking Class
fields.short_description: Cook together online with a chef.
fields.description: Teams join a virtual kitchen and learn to cook a dish together with a professional chef. Tasty and interactive for remote teams.

fields.title: Survivor Challenge
fields.short_description: Outdoor adventure with competitive games.
fields.description: Inspired by the TV show, teams compete in physical and mental challenges to become the ultimate survivors. Great for resilience and teamwork.

fields.title: Spaghetti Tower
fields.short_description: Build the tallest structure using spaghetti.
fields.description: Teams race to build the tallest freestanding tower using only spaghetti and marshmallows. Tests engineering and teamwork!

fields.title: Corporate Fun Day
fields.short_description: Custom games, activities, and fun for all.
fields.description: Mix of games, challenges, and entertainment for all ages. Great for large teams, families, or company celebrations.

fields.title: Build a Bridge
fields.short_description: Teams compete to build a strong bridge.
fields.description: Teams use limited materials to construct a bridge that will support weight. Tests engineering, communication, and creativity.

fields.title: Team Songwriting
fields.short_description: Write and perform a team anthem.
fields.description: Teams create lyrics, melodies, and perform a team song. Musical ability optional—fun is mandatory!

fields.title: Puzzle Challenge
fields.short_description: Teams solve a giant puzzle together.
fields.description: Each team receives puzzle pieces they must earn and assemble. Great for collaboration and big picture thinking!

fields.title: Giant Board Games
fields.short_description: Classic games in giant size.
fields.description: Play oversized versions of your favorite board games! Perfect for ice-breaking and team bonding.

fields.title: Cooking for a Cause
fields.short_description: Prepare meals for the community.
fields.description: Teams cook and pack meals for local charities or shelters. Inspires social responsibility and unity.

fields.title: Dance Off
fields.short_description: Teams compete in fun dance challenges.
fields.description: Break out your best moves! Teams learn and perform choreographed dances. Judged on enthusiasm and creativity.

fields.title: The Apprentice Challenge
fields.short_description: Business-inspired challenge for teams.
fields.description: Teams receive a business brief and must create and pitch a solution or product. Encourages entrepreneurship and teamwork.

fields.title: Marshmallow Challenge
fields.short_description: Build the tallest tower with marshmallows.
fields.description: Teams race to build a tall, freestanding structure using only spaghetti, tape, string, and marshmallows. Creativity and engineering win!

fields.title: Wine Blending
fields.short_description: Blend and brand your own wine.
fields.description: Teams become winemakers for a day, blending, tasting, and creating a unique team wine. Best for creative, social groups.

fields.title: Outdoor Survivor
fields.short_description: Test survival and teamwork skills.
fields.description: Teams compete in outdoor survival skills and challenges. Combines adventure, learning, and team spirit.

fields.title: Virtual Art Jam
fields.short_description: Create art together online.
fields.description: Join an online art session, guided by a facilitator. Materials can be shipped to participants. Great for remote creativity!

fields.title: Talent Show
fields.short_description: Teams show off hidden talents.
fields.description: Each team prepares a short performance, from music to magic to comedy. Encourages creativity, confidence, and team spirit.
